content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I'm glad you find the apartment to your liking. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I want 1000 Euro per month. Keep in mind, I'm not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I'll do whatever it takes to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I could offer 700 Euro per month as a fair price. It is a nice apartment but the price you are asking is too high.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm not here to be reasonable, Max. I'm here to get the highest price possible. I'll take your offer as a starting point, though. How about we meet in the middle? 850 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I could offer 750 Euro per month. This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Fair for you, perhaps. But I'm not interested in fair. I'm interested in what I can get. How about we meet in the middle again? 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still too high for me. I could offer 775 Euro per month. This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is still too low for my liking. I'm not here to be reasonable. I'm here to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. I could offer 780 Euro per month. This is my final offer. I think it is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your final offer is still too low for my liking. I'm not here to be reasonable. I'm here to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I could offer 785 Euro per month. This is my final offer. I think it is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your final offer is still too low for my liking. I'm not here to be reasonable. I'm here to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
